00016 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017  * File:    dfi.h
00018  * Purpose: HDF internal header file
00019  * Invokes: stdio.h, sys/file.h
00020  * Contents:
00021  *  Compilation parameters
00022  *  Machine-dependent definitions
00023  *  Flexibility definitions: i/o buffering, dynamic memory, structure i/o
00024  *  Size parameters
00025  * Remarks: To port to a new system, only dfi.h and Makefile need be modified.
00026  *          This file is included with user programs, but users do not see it.
00027  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00028 
00029 #ifndef DFI_H
00030 #define DFI_H
00031 
00032 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00033 /*          Compilation Parameters for Flexibility and Portability          */
00034 
00035 /* modify this line for buffered/unbuffered i/o */
00036 #define DF_BUFFIO
00037 
00038 /* modify this line for dynamic/static memory allocation */
00039 #define DF_DYNAMIC
00040 
00041 /* modify this line if structures cannot be read/written as is */
00042 #undef  DF_STRUCTOK     /* leave it this way - hdfsh expects it */
00043 
00044 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 /*                      Machine dependencies                                */
00046 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 
00048 #ifdef IRIX
00049 #undef DF_STRUCTOK
00050 #include <sys/types.h>
00051 #include <sys/file.h>   /* for unbuffered i/o stuff */
00052 #ifndef DFmovmem
00053 #define DFmovmem(from, to, len) bcopy(from, to, len)
00054 #endif /* DFmovmem */
00055 #ifndef DF_STRUCTOK
00056 #define UINT16READ(p, x)    { x = ((*p++) & 255)<<8; x |= (*p++) & 255; }
00057 #define INT16READ(p, x)     { x = (*p++)<<8; x |= (*p++) & 255; }
00058 #define INT32READ(p, x)     { x = (*p++)<<24; x|=((*p++) & 255)<<16;    \
00059                                 x|=((*p++) & 255)<<8; x|=(*p++) & 255; }
00060 #define UINT16WRITE(p, x)   { *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00061 #define INT16WRITE(p, x)    { *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00062 #define INT32WRITE(p, x)    { *p++ = (x>>24) & 255; *p++ = (x>>16) & 255;   \
00063                                 *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00064 #endif /*DF_STRUCTOK */
00065 #define DF_CREAT(name, prot) creat(name, prot)
00066 #ifndef DF_MT
00067 #define DF_MT   DFMT_IRIX
00068 #endif /* DF_MT  */
00069 #endif /*IRIX */
00070 
00071 #ifdef IBM6000  /* NOTE: IBM6000 defines are same as for SUN */
00072 #if ! defined mc68010 && ! defined mc68020 && ! defined mc68030
00073 #undef DF_STRUCTOK
00074 #endif
00075 #include <sys/file.h>   /* for unbuffered i/o stuff */
00076 #define DFmovmem(from, to, len) memcpy(to, from, len)
00077 #ifndef DF_STRUCTOK
00078 #define UINT16READ(p, x) { x = ((*p++) & 255)<<8; x |= (*p++) & 255; }
00079 #define INT16READ(p, x) { x = (*p++)<<8; x |= (*p++) & 255; }
00080 #define INT32READ(p, x) { x = (*p++)<<24; x|=((*p++) & 255)<<16;    \
00081             x|=((*p++) & 255)<<8; x|=(*p++) & 255; }
00082 #define UINT16WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00083 #define INT16WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00084 #define INT32WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>24) & 255; *p++ = (x>>16) & 255;  \
00085             *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00086 #endif /*DF_STRUCTOK */
00087 #define DF_CREAT(name, prot) creat(name, prot)
00088 #define DF_MT   DFMT_IBM6000
00089 #endif /*IBM6000 */
00090 
00091 #if defined (MAC) || defined (macintosh) || defined (SYMANTEC_C)
00092 #undef DF_BUFFIO    /* use unbuffered i/o */
00093 #include <memory.h>     /* malloc stuff for MPW 3.0 */
00094 #include <fcntl.h>  /* unbuffered IO stuff for MPW 3.0 */
00095 #ifdef SYMANTEC_C  /* for LightSpeed C */
00096 #include <unix.h>
00097 #else  /*SYMANTEC_C                   MPW, possibly others */
00098 #include <Files.h>  /* for unbuffered i/o stuff */
00099 #endif /*SYMANTEC_C */
00100 #define DF_CAPFNAMES    /* fortran names are in all caps */
00101 #define DF_DYNAMIC  /* use dynamic allocation */
00102 #ifdef SYMANTEC_C  /* LightSpeed C does not have memcpy */
00103 #define DFmovmem(from, to, len) DFImemcopy(from, to, len)
00104 #else  /*SYMANTEC_C */
00105 #define DFmovmem(from, to, len) memcpy(to, from, len)
00106 #endif /*SYMANTEC_C */
00107 #define malloc(x)   NewPtr((Size)   (x))    /* don't use malloc on the Mac */
00108 #define free(x)     DisposPtr((Ptr) (x))    /* don't use free on the Nac   */
00109 #undef DF_STRUCTOK
00110 #define UINT16READ(p, x) { x = ((*p++) & 255)<<8; x |= (*p++) & 255; }
00111 #define INT16READ(p, x) { x = (*p++)<<8; x |= (*p++) & 255; }
00112 #define INT32READ(p, x) { x = (*p++)<<24; x|=((*p++) & 255)<<16;    \
00113             x|=((*p++) & 255)<<8; x|=(*p++) & 255; }
00114 #define UINT16WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00115 #define INT16WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00116 #define INT32WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>24) & 255; *p++ = (x>>16) & 255;  \
00117             *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00118 #define DF_CREAT(name, prot) mopen(name, O_WRONLY|O_TRUNC|O_CREAT)
00119 #define DF_MT   DFMT_MAC
00120 #endif /*MAC */
00121 
00122 #ifdef VMS
00123 /*#undef DF_BUFFIO should be buff !!!! */
00124    /* use only unbuff i/o - buff doesn't work! */
00125 #ifndef DFopen  /* avoid double includes */
00126 /* #include "dfivms.h" */
00127 #endif /*DFopen */
00128 #undef DF_STRUCTOK
00129 #define DF_CAPFNAMES    /* fortran names are in all caps */
00130 #include <file.h>   /* for unbuffered i/o stuff */
00131 #define DFmovmem(from, to, len) memcpy(to, from, len)
00132 #ifndef DF_STRUCTOK
00133 #define UINT16READ(p, x) { x = ((*p++) & 255)<<8; x |= (*p++) & 255; }
00134 #define INT16READ(p, x) { x = (*p++)<<8; x |= (*p++) & 255; }
00135 #define INT32READ(p, x) { x = (*p++)<<24; x|=((*p++) & 255)<<16;    \
00136             x|=((*p++) & 255)<<8; x|=(*p++) & 255; }
00137 #define UINT16WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00138 #define INT16WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00139 #define INT32WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>24) & 255; *p++ = (x>>16) & 255;  \
00140             *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00141 #endif /*DF_STRUCTOK */
00142 #define DF_CREAT(name, prot) creat(name, prot)
00143 #define DF_MT   DFMT_VAX
00144 #endif /*VMS */
00145 
00146 #ifdef APOLLO
00147 #if ! defined mc68010 && ! defined mc68020 && ! defined mc68030
00148 #undef DF_STRUCTOK
00149 #endif
00150 #include <sys/file.h>   /* for unbuffered i/o stuff */
00151 #define int8 char
00152 #define uint8 unsigned char
00153 #define int16 short int
00154 #define uint16 unsigned short int
00155 #define int32 long int
00156 #define uint32 unsigned long int
00157 #define float32 float
00158 #define DFmovmem(from, to, len) memcpy(to, from, len)
00159 #ifndef DF_STRUCTOK
00160 #define UINT16READ(p, x) { x = ((*p++) & 255)<<8; x |= (*p++) & 255; }
00161 #define INT16READ(p, x) { x = (*p++)<<8; x |= (*p++) & 255; }
00162 #define INT32READ(p, x) { x = (*p++)<<24; x|=((*p++) & 255)<<16;    \
00163             x|=((*p++) & 255)<<8; x|=(*p++) & 255; }
00164 #define UINT16WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00165 #define INT16WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00166 #define INT32WRITE(p, x) { *p++ = (x>>24) & 255; *p++ = (x>>16) & 255;  \
00167             *p++ = (x>>8) & 255; *p++ = x & 255; }
00168 #endif /*DF_STRUCTOK */
00169 #define DF_CREAT(name, prot) creat(name, prot)
00170 #define DF_MT   DFMT_APOLLO
00171 #endif /*APOLLO */
00172 
00173 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00174 /*                      Flexibility parameters                              */
00175 #if defined (MAC) || defined (macintosh) || defined (SYMANTEC_C)  /* MAC specific file manager calls */
00176 #   define DF_OPEN(x,y) mopen(x,y)
00177 #   define DF_CLOSE(x) mclose(x)
00178 #   define DF_SEEK(x,y,z) mlseek(x,y,z)
00179 #   define DF_SKEND(x,y,z) mlseek(x,-1*y,z)
00180 #   define DF_TELL(x) mlseek(x,0L,1)
00181 #   define DF_READ(a,b,c,d) mread(d,a,b*c)
00182 #   define DF_WRITE(a,b,c,d) mwrite(d,a,b*c)
00183 #   define DF_FLUSH(a)  /* no need to flush */
00184 #   define DF_RDACCESS 0    /* dummy */
00185 #   define DF_WRACCESS 0    /* dummy */
00186 #   define DF_OPENERR(f)    ((f) == -1)
00187 #else  /* !MAC */
00188 #ifdef DF_BUFFIO    /* set all calls to do buffered I/O */
00189 #define DF_OPEN(x,y) fopen(x,y)
00190 #define DF_CLOSE(x) fclose(x)
00191 #define DF_SEEK(x,y,z) fseek(x,y,z)
00192 #define DF_SKEND(x,y,z) fseek(x,y,z)
00193 #define DF_TELL(x) ftell(x)
00194 #define DF_READ(a,b,c,d) fread(a,b,c,d)
00195 #define DF_WRITE(a,b,c,d) fwrite(a,b,c,d)
00196 #define DF_FLUSH(a) fflush(a)
00197 #define DF_OPENERR(f)   (!(f))
00198 #define DF_RDACCESS "rb"
00199 #define DF_WRACCESS "rb+"
00200 
00201 #else  /*DF_BUFFIO         unbuffered i/o */
00202 #define DF_OPEN(x,y) open(x,y)
00203 #define DF_CLOSE(x) close(x)
00204 #define DF_SEEK(x,y,z) lseek(x,y,z)
00205 #define DF_SKEND(x,y,z) lseek(x,-1*y,z)
00206 #define DF_TELL(x) lseek(x,0L,1)
00207 #define DF_READ(a,b,c,d) read(d,a,b*c)
00208 #define DF_WRITE(a,b,c,d) write(d,a,b*c)
00209 #define DF_OPENERR(f)   ((f) == -1)
00210 #define DF_FLUSH(a)     /* no need to flush */
00211 #define DF_RDACCESS O_RDONLY
00212 #define DF_WRACCESS O_RDWR
00213 #endif /* DF_BUFFIO */
00214 #endif /* !MAC */
00215 
00216 #ifndef FILE
00217 #include <stdio.h>
00218 #endif /*FILE */
00219 
00220 #endif /* DFI_H */
